Who am I?

Now that is a good question


Hard to define one being, but I can surely entertain you with some words

My name is Mirco Barbero and am passionate about design, technology and business.
In my professional life, I help companies design solutions for hard problems. Something on the line of:

â€œHow could we improve our product for our customers?â€
â€œWhat would be the perfect size for a cup of tea?â€
or even
â€œHow many times have we done this in the wrong way?â€

My line of work revolves mainly around asking questions: right ones, bad ones, ugly ones, silly ones... sometimes right ones.
They might seem innocuous and simple, but most of the time are building blocks for great solutions.

Now, in my spare time, which is most of it, I am a passionate reader and sometimes even writer.
I sceptically believe, I curiously learn and I seriously FlÃ¢neur.

If you are interested in something more, feel free to explore this website and most importantly, enjoy.
